title: Intensive Basic Spanish Course for Medical Field Application

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic medical terminology and beginner-level English communication skills
context.additional_context: Targets pharmaceutical/medical device company managers, aiming to cultivate immediately applicable Spanish communication skills in healthcare settings.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and verbally explain over 50 basic medical vocabulary terms (symptoms, prescriptions, dosage instructions) in Spanish
Learners can perform basic consultation scenarios with Spanish-speaking patients (allergy verification, medication instructions) with 80% accuracy
Learners can translate medical documents (simple prescriptions, patient guidelines) into Spanish and extract core information with 90% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
